Tried to keep this interview exactly 13 minutes, but there was so much to talk about. From #Lover, to re-recording her albums, to touring…it’s all here. Thanks @TaylorSwift13 for catching up with us! #TaylorSwiftOnSeacrest https://t.co/g8xAzmPu2C

@taylorswift13 .@TaylorSwift13's not sure if she'll play #Lover in stadiums. She wants to make it feel intimate: “My goal for whatever live setting that we decide to do things in...I'm going to try to make it smaller and feel like a living room as much as I possibly can.” #TaylorSwiftOnSeacrest
@taylorswift13 On the plus side, more time to plan = a better experience for fans: “I want to give them 113% every show so I need for it to be in a way that feels right.” #TaylorSwiftOnSeacrest

@taylorswift13 Why she told her team to hold off #Lover tour plans:  “I literally just took my tights off and my thigh-high boots off from the last tour ... I really can’t feel like my life is just album… tour… album… tour… album… tour… album… tour.” #TaylorSwiftOnSeacrest

@taylorswift13 If and how she'll tour #Lover: “I definitely want to give the fans the opportunity & give me the opportunity to vibe with them on these songs in a live setting & see them sing the words back, but I don’t really know exactly what way that’s going to happen.” #TaylorSwiftOnSeacrest

@taylorswift13 On finally owning her art moving forward: “I’m actually really excited. This whole phase of my life is very much about freedom and the #Lover album to me completely represents freedom.” #TaylorSwiftOnSeacrest

If @TaylorSwift13 will re-record her past albums differently, she tells me: “I’m really going to be listening to the fans because there are some amazing ideas that they’ve had.”

Here you go #Swifties. Time to submit those ideas. #TaylorSwiftOnSeacrest

On getting the best album reviews she's ever received with #Lover, she says: "It gets me emotional even talking about it. I can’t explain to you how good that feels because it's the first thing that no one can take from me. No one can sell it. It's mine.” #TaylorSwiftOnSeacrest
